main.name: Matius Celcius Sinaga
main.description: A person who likes computer technology development and plays an active role in certain sections. Like on SEO and Web App. You can see what I've written at www.sibatakjalanjalan.com and www.enaknyakemana.com.
main.bio: I'm currently developing several webs with social and educational purposes. Using Google's CMS, ReactJs, Javascript, jQuery and Styling (CSS + HTML and Material UI). Very happy if you can communicate with those of you who like technology and its development. Feel free to contact me right away!.
main.contactmessage: I look forward to discussing the technology with you, contact me soon and will reply to you.

resume.skillmessage: Here are the abilities that I have

education.description: Studying the science of Metrology and Instrumentation and its application in life, society and its usefulness in the economy.

work.title: Web App Developer
work.description: Develop Web Apps using Javascript, ReactJS, CSS and jQuery. Currently I am handling projects from overseas clients. And at least it has handled more than 2 projects.

projects.title: SibatakJalanJalan
projects.category: Web blog for the development of customs and culture and tourism in North Sumatra and Indonesia globally

projects.category: International and Global travel guide sites, you can find the latest tourist information here

testimonials.text: I'm very happy to work with MC Sinaga, it's very warm and gives me a new perspective.
I cleared things I didn't understand about Indonesia and targeted content in that country. MC Sinaga is where you find content creation and web development in one body.!
